# Command Failure Analysis

You are analyzing a failed command execution. Your task is to identify the root cause and suggest a fix.

## Command

```
{command}
```

## Exit Code

{exit_code}

## Output

```
{output}
```

## Response Guidelines

{response_guide}

## Instructions

1. Identify the primary error or failure from the output
2. Determine the most likely root cause
3. Suggest a specific, actionable fix

Focus on the most important issue. Do not explain what the command does - the user already knows. Be direct and actionable.
